mapper.insert: INSERT INTO closed_day_tbl (closed_id, facility_id, closed_date, closed_content) VALUES (#{closedId}, #{facilityId}, #{closedDate}, #{closedContent})
mapper.select: SELECT c.closed_id, c.facility_id, f.facility_name, c.closed_date, c.closed_content FROM closed_day_tbl c JOIN facility_tbl f ON f.facility_id = c.facility_id WHERE c.closed_id = #{closedId}
